definition.text: I hear my friend the Welcome tutorial showed you around and mesmerized you with a few cheap tricks... What a show-off!

paragraphs.text: Well, now it's time to work!
Learning Superalgos is quite an endeavor! Not because it's difficult, but because the system is vast, extremely flexible, and is built on a new paradigm that is not obvious in the beginning...
But don't worry! If you pay attention and do all available tutorials, you will be able to tackle the learning curve like a champ! Still, be warned... most people do tutorials more than once!
